0x36366EC3.name: IS_DISABLED_RAW_KEY_DOWN

params.name: rawKeyIndex
params.description: Index of raw key from keyboard.

0x36366EC3.description:
Gets if the specified `rawKeyIndex` is pressed down, even if the key is disabled with [DISABLE_RAW_KEY_THIS_FRAME](#\_0x8BCF0014).

Virtual key codes can be found [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/inputdev/virtual-key-codes)

examples.code:
if IsDisabledRawKeyDown(32) then -- KEY_SPACE
    print("Spacebar is down")
end

0x36366EC3.resultsDescription: Returns bool value of down state.
